rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a wheelchair-accessible ramp leading to the interior. The hall is designed for easy navigation and adherence to Vastu principles by aligning doorways in the North-East direction.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan contemporary living space, merging the dining area into the living room with ample natural light coming from east-facing windows to balance energy flow as per Vastu. It features a flexible layout that includes seating areas and entertainment zones.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen integrated with smart appliances, designed for accessibility with lower countertops and adjustable heights. Features include an island counter to enhance social interaction while ensuring functional workflow aligned with Vastu orientation.

rooms.name: Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: A multipurpose space functioning as a bedroom and workspace, complete with built-in storage and soft lighting. The room is oriented towards the North-West to promote positivity and balance according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: An expansive, well-equipped gym area equipped with modern exercise equipment, free weights, and ample space for wheelchair-accessible workout routines. Designed on a dedicated section of the level with proper ventilation and soundproofing.

openings.description: A wide doorway ensuring easy accessibility, enhanced with automatic sliding doors to accommodate wheelchairs.

openings.location: East wall of the Living & Dining Area
openings.description: Large windows that allow abundant natural light, enhancing energy and space as per Vastu principles.
